Room.Name: Allakaren Circle
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking around the western edge of the Allakaren Circle.
Room.LongDescription: The mysterious tree which grows inside the Allakaren Circle is said to have existed long before any humans had inhabitted the area now known as Oceancrest, and could have been the product of the elves. Nevertheless, the Pharaoh Allakaren adopted the long-living tree as his own and gave the blood of his wives as a sacrifice to the tree. It is also believed that the blood of Allakaren also runs through the roots of the tree.
